text: Nabiyow cusey: ama marak horta aka maray Sabti ayrot Yallih amri cine maray cagguduk tatre kassiisak sugek Yalli finqisu waah hinnay gibdi digaalah digaalu waa mara macah kassisaanaa? Itte, Sabti ayr√≥t caddok taturak suge mara umaanek waasak suge mari keenil gacisak:umaanek ken kah waasnam sin Rabbih xaqul ken kassisneemih malkit kee Sumaq geynaah usun Yallak meesitaanaah kaal gacaanamkeh iyyaanama keenik iyyen
